titles.title: To provide for the issuance of the Peace Corps Semipostal Stamp.
Peace Corps Stamp Act
Peace Corps Stamp Act
Peace Corps Stamp Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Peace Corps Stamp Act
This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to issue a Peace Corps Semipostal Stamp for 10 years to afford the public with a convenient way to help fund the Peace Corps' Global Fund.
